channel.title: NPC / Login not working after i putted new NPC's in
channel.description:
(My server is pimpscape based) This is a piece of my Autospawn NPC list:

(!Jes, its stands on the good way, here you can't post it NOT wide enough!) What did i do wrong? If i start the server, it says: exception in main thread ''main'' java.long.numberformatexceptions: for input string: ''0 '' at java.lang.numberformatexceptions.forinputstring{unknown source} at java.lang.integer.parseInt{unknown source} at java.lang.integer.parseInt{unknown source} at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn{NPCHandler.java:1294} at NPCHandler. {NPCHandler.java:23} at server.main{server.java:27} Hope u can help, if so, very ty!
